participant_1.background:
I dress professionally for work and wear comfortable clothes on vacation.
i need to use an inhaler sometimes.
I take my dog for a walk in the park before I head to work at the museum.
i have a lot of allergies.
i work as a veterinarians assistant.

participant_2.background:
I'm not rich but I do have a lot of pictures and stories to share from my travels.
I live in the suburbs because it is a quiet place where I can relax and enjoy my family and friends.
My biggest fear is that I will work myself up so much that I will become ill.
I like to watch old movies from my childhood to feel like a kid again.
i have a toddler.

content.text: Good morning! I'm excited to go to the museum today.
I like museums too. I have a toddler so we go to a lot of children's museums.
I like to go to museums to learn about new things. I'm a veterinarian's assistant so I like to learn about animals.
That's awesome! I wish I could work with animals. I love them so much.
I love animals too. I have a dog that I take for a walk in the park before I go to work.
I wish I could walk my dog more but I have a toddler who needs a lot of attention.
I can imagine! Toddlers are a lot of work.
I'm sure your dog loves the walks though.
Yeah, he loves them. He's a great dog.
